properties.name: establishedIn
properties.description: year the zoo was established in

properties.name: director
properties.description: Employee that is the director of the zoo

properties.name: function
properties.description: function the employee has in the zoo

properties.name: jobtitle
properties.description: function or title of the job of an employee

properties.name: classificationFamily
properties.description: what kind of species is the animal, for example Elephantidae (=elephant)

properties.name: inCage
properties.description: Which cage is the animal in

properties.name: keeper
properties.description: the employee who is responsible for zoo keeping this animal

properties.name: eatsFood
properties.description: Type of food this animal eats

properties.name: name
properties.description: name of the species or animal classification family

properties.name: name
properties.description: name of the animal classification order

properties.name: name
properties.description: name of the food for the animal

properties.name: retailPrice
properties.description: retailprice of the food per inventory unit

properties.name: Location
properties.description: geolocation of the cage in the zoo

properties.name: cleaner
properties.description: the employee who cleans the cage

properties.name: keeper
properties.description: the employee who is responsible for zoo keeping this cage

properties.name: emptiedBy
properties.description: the employee who emptied the container

properties.name: enteredAt
properties.description: Time the car entered the parking lot

properties.name: exitedAt
properties.description: Time the car left the parking lot

properties.name: location
properties.description: location where the car is parked

properties.name: id
properties.description: an id or label identifying the particular bench

properties.name: visitors
properties.description: number of visiters who have used the bench

properties.name: location
properties.description: location of the object in the zoo

properties.name: id
properties.description: an id or label identifying the particular lamp

properties.name: lastCheck
properties.description: when it was last checked by maintenance staff

properties.name: location
properties.description: location of the object in the zoo

properties.name: id
properties.description: an id or label identifying the particular facility

properties.name: type
properties.description: type of facility (e.g. restroom, drinking fountain, etc.

properties.name: maintainedBy
properties.description: by who it was maintained last

properties.name: location
properties.description: location of the facility in the zoo

properties.name: stockType
properties.description: type of stock used (e.g. toilet paper, soap)

properties.description: interaction of a visitor with the facility

properties.name: id
properties.description: an id or label identifying the particular facility

properties.name: type
properties.description: type of facility (e.g. feeding station, staff cantine, etc.

properties.name: location
properties.description: location of the facility in the zoo

properties.name: users
properties.description: number of users of the facility

properties.name: stockType
properties.description: type of stock used (e.g. food, animalfood, etc)

properties.description: interaction of a visitor with the facility

properties.name: numberOfVisitors
properties.description: number of vistitors who have visited the shop

classes.description: Entrance ti]icket to visit the animal park

properties.name: date
properties.description: Date the ticket is sold and valid to use in the zoo.

properties.name: soldAt
properties.description: Counter where the ticket was sold

classes.description: Entrance ti]icket to visit the animal park

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of zoo entree ticket, e.g. Child, Normal, Group, 65+

classes.description: discount voucher to complete purchases with

properties.name: issuedBy
properties.description: issuer of the voucher (could be magazine etc.)

properties.name: expirationDate
properties.description: expiry date for use of voucher

properties.name: minimalOrderValue
properties.description: least amount to get the discount

properties.name: forUsageIn
properties.description: Shop that allow usage of voucher

properties.name: ticketNumber
properties.description: Unique ticket number of the visitor.

classes.description: Product that can be bought by visitors in the animal park.

properties.name: inStock
properties.description: True if in stock, false if sold.

properties.name: type
properties.description: type of the product, e.g. toy, food, drinks

properties.name: method
properties.description: payment method, e.g. chash, debit card, credit card etc

properties.name: type
properties.description: type of entertainment, e.g. feeding show, tour

classes.description: Place where tickets for the zoo are sold
